message_1: Given a dataset of the weights (in pounds) and heights (in inches) of 10 people, perform a regression analysis to find the linear equation that relates height to weight. Then use this equation to predict the weight of a 6-foot tall person.
message_2: To perform a regression analysis, we need the dataset of weights and heights of the 10 people. Please provide the dataset so that I can calculate the linear equation and predict the weight of a 6-foot tall person.
